# ResumePolish

> AI-powered resume optimization for job seekers. Transform your resume for any job in 30 seconds.

ResumePolish is a web application at https://resumepolish.io that uses OpenAI's GPT-4o to optimize resumes for specific industries and job roles.

## What it does

- Users upload a resume (PDF or DOCX)
- Select a target industry and job role
- AI rewrites the resume optimized for that specific position
- Premium users get Harvard-style executive formatting, ATS keyword optimization, interview talking points, and a Resume Strength Score

## Pricing

- Free: 3 AI resume revisions (no credit card required)
- Starter: $4.99 for 5 premium revisions
- Professional: $9.99 for 15 premium revisions (best value)
- Power User: $19.99 for 50 premium revisions

## Premium features

- Harvard Business School / MIT resume formatting
- ATS (Applicant Tracking System) keyword optimization
- CAR format bullets (Challenge, Action, Result)
- Professional Summary generation
- Interview talking points based on resume content
- Resume Strength Score (1-10)

## How to use

1. Visit https://resumepolish.io
2. Sign up for free
3. Upload your resume
4. Select your target industry and role
5. Get your AI-optimized resume in 30 seconds
